member.name: T:VL.App.WindowsForms.WindowsFormsMainLoopTimer
member.summary: Inaccurate timer implementation using a windows forms internally.

member.name: E:VL.App.WindowsForms.WindowsFormsMainLoopTimer.Tick
member.summary: Occurs when the Timer has completed one interval.

member.name: P:VL.App.WindowsForms.WindowsFormsMainLoopTimer.Interval
member.summary: Gets or sets the time between Tick events.

member.name: P:VL.App.WindowsForms.WindowsFormsMainLoopTimer.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the timer mode.

member.name: P:VL.App.WindowsForms.WindowsFormsMainLoopTimer.Increment
member.summary: Gets or sets the time increment. Used when is set to true.

member.name: P:VL.App.WindowsForms.WindowsFormsMainLoopTimer.IsRunning
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Timer is running.
